divs: sighting detailsvisually observed a large object passing overhead from straight west to east during the very dark night because of large reddish\yellow or reddish\orange lights. because if appeared close to the ground in proximity for the size of its shape in the night sky, i stopped my car and got out. i stood and watched it pass overhead at a very low rate of speed. the shape was of a very large triangle object with a pattern of lights under the craft which neither pulsed or blinked. the distance in the dark from where i stood to where the object passed overhead was hard to discern but was far too low to be any kind of large commercial aircraft in a flight path to sioux falls, sd airport. it was moving west to east at a very slow speed. as i was just outside the place i work to watch a couple hot air balloons pass by i would estimate that the rate it passed overhead to be 2-3 times the air speed of a hot air balloon. i stood until the object passed nearly out of sight heading toward the iowa border. i was neither scared or amazed at this, although it never sped up or slowed down during the entire event and as i said was far to close in proximity to the ground to have proceeded north toward the airport in sioux falls. that, of course, is just my humble opinion. i have spent a couple occasions looking at various ufo sightings for iowa and places in the u.s. and some ot the pictures of triangle shaped objects with lights are very similar to what i observed. don't really know why i have not reported seeing this until now, except that i am 62 years old and i have seen alot in this world anyway. thanks for your consideration.
Summary: object passed overhead on way to work in Canton, SD early a.m.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Harrisburg & Canton, SD
This sighting has never been favorited.
